action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ X X X ▢
X ▢ X ▢ X
X X ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X
X X ▢ X X

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with a vertical line of empty squares in the third column, and the rest mostly filled with Xs except for the first and last squares in the first row, and the second and fourth squares in the second row.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
▢ ▢ ▢ ▢ X
▢ ▢ ▢ X X
▢ ▢ X X X
▢ X X X X
X X X X X

DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with Xs forming a triangle in the bottom right, filling the diagonal and all cells below and to the right of it. The top row has one X at the far right, the second row has two Xs at the right, and so on, until the bottom row is all Xs.

This is my DESCRIPTION: A 5x5 grid with a vertical line of empty squares in the third column, and the rest mostly filled with Xs except for the first and last squares in the first row, and the second and fourth squares in the second row.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: Are there any rows in your grid that are completely filled with Xs?

QUESTION: Are there any rows in your grid that are completely filled with Xs? Start your answer with "ANSWER:" and do not add anything else.

QUESTION: Is there a column in your grid that contains only empty squares and no Xs at all?
